data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Phymorhynchus (Neogastropoda: Raphitomidae) from a hydrothermal vent in the Manus Back-Arc Basin

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Shuqian, Zhang, Suping (2017): A new species of the genus Phymorhynchus (Neogastropoda: Raphitomidae) from a hydrothermal vent in the Manus Back-Arc Basin. Zootaxa 4300 (3): 441-444, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4300.3.7
